A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 91%?  People are forcing themselves to like this terrible movie.  Don't really like any of the characters including Luke surprisingly enough.  Kylo Ren is a sissy and Rey is basic.  Poe is the only character with balls and all they do is punish him for not blindly obeying authority.  The movie begins with them running from the first order and ends with them running from the first order.  I don't need my Star Wars movies to be great\, all I ask is that they don't suck.  This one sucks....FIX IT DISNEY!
